Class ShowStudentTestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.AbstractController
      • gui.ShowStudentTestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SceneSetter
    public class ShowStudentTestController
extends AbstractController
    The controller class for displaying a student test.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShowStudentTestController

        public ShowStudentTestController()
        Constructs a new ShowStudentTestController and initializes the data. This constructor initializes the necessary fields and retrieves the questions from the DB for the test.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Initializes the controller and sets up the display of the test information and questions. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded.

      • setInfo

        public void setInfo()
        Sets the information of the test and updates the display. This method populates various labels and text flows with the relevant information about the test and its instructions for students and lecturers, based on the current screen state. It also adjusts the formatting and styling of the displayed elements.

      • showCorrectAnswers

        public void showCorrectAnswers()
        Displays the correct answers for each question. This method highlights the correct answer for each question by styling the corresponding radio button, indicating that it is the correct answer.

      • showCorrectAnswersAndStudentAnswer

        public void showCorrectAnswersAndStudentAnswer()
        Displays the correct answers for each question and highlights the student's selected answer. This method highlights the correct answer for each question by styling the corresponding radio button, indicating that it is the correct answer. Additionally, it identifies and highlights the student's selected answer, indicating whether it is correct or incorrect.
